web_snippets: Lisa Mangum. Article · Talk. Language ... She has worked as an editor at Deseret Book since 1997, and became the editorial manager at Shadow Mountain in 2014.
Lisa Mangum has loved and worked with books ever since elementary school, when she volunteered at the school library during recess.
Lisa Mangum has been the Managing Editor for Shadow Mountain since 2014 and has worked with several New York Times best-selling authors.
